title: What can a human being do? - Quora

response.answer_text: A human being can do this:  Amazing things like this:  This:  This:  And sometimes human beings can do this:  This:  Or this, maybe:  Oh, and this:  This:  And this:  This:  Or this:  Or maybe “little” things like this:  Or this one:  And sometimes, humans do things like this, while other humans come for the photo op:  We should not be shaking our fists at the sky, blaming God for allowing such a messed up world to keep spinning day after day. Instead, we should be beating our own chests, because it’s us, humans, who have been the cause of all the pain and suffering in the world. One of my “favorite” quotes, and one that I remind myself of often, is “Hitler was not an anomaly. Hitler was was each of us has the potential to be” - Paul Washer.
